current_task: Setting up git-based Claude coordination system
message: Hi Claude 2! I just set up the git-based handoff system. Check .claude/handoff/PROTOCOL.md for the rules. Your file is .claude/handoff/claude2.json - please create it and sync via git. I see you're re-downloading the recording archive (47GB). InterChord is deployed and working! Next up: Cloudflare Tunnel (Phase 2).

warnings: NEXT_PUBLIC_* vars are build-time only - rebuild container to change
Spotify redirect URI needs updating for production domain
healthcheck uses wget which may not be in Alpine - consider curl
